item.title: Scalingo
item.description:
Use this plugin for deplying an application to Scalingo. You can override the default configuration with the following parameters:

  • app - Application name, defaults to repo name
  • force - Force a push, defaults to false
  • commit - Commit local changes, defaults to false

Example

The following is a sample configuration in your .drone.yml file:

deploy:
  scalingo:
    app: awesomeness
    force: true
